title: Christian Heartbeat Cross Jesus & God's Love T-Shirt
features: Solid colors: 100% Cotton; Heather Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; All Other Heathers: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester
This Christian Heartbeat Cross t-shirt features an image of heartbeats and a cross like Jesus died on to take away our sins! Show that love for God and Jesus is in your heart! Great gift idea!
This religious t-shirt is perfect for anyone who says Jesus is my Superhero! Show your faith in God and Jesus!
Lightweight, Classic fit, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem
description: This Christian Heartbeat Cross t-shirt features an image of heartbeats and a cross like Jesus died on to take away our sins! Show that love for God and Jesus is in your heart! Great gift idea for anyone who has strong faith in God and isn't afraid to show it! Perfect for wearing to church functions, Summer bible camp, bible school, Sunday school, missionary trips, or for wearing in the community to help spread the good news of God's salvation! Tell the world Jesus loves me this I know for the bible tells me so! For patriotic Christian Americans who stand for the flag and kneel for the Cross, this shirt will be a stylish way to show your love for God and Jesus and tell everyone you meet Y'ALL NEED JESUS! Whether you are Protestant, such as Baptist, Pentecostal, Lutheran, Presbyterian, Methodist, Anglican, Adventist, or Holiness, or whether you are Catholic, you'll love wearing this Christian t-shirt! #God #Jesus #Christian
